title: SIMPLE ROAST CHICKEN
directions: Preheat oven to 400. Fill body of the chicken with onions and lemon. Generously season the outside of the chicken with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with thyme. Roast chicken for about an hour, or until internal temperature reaches 165.
ingredients: 3 lb chicken, washed and patted dry with paper towels
1 lemon, quartered and cut in half
